text: @WestCumbriaRT @EnvAgencyNW üòç
RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Our officers are on site at the major fire in Bradford today using pumps to get rid of water contaminated by the tyres.‚Ä¶
@GarethDLaT @InnesThomson @EnvAgencyYNE @ERfloodrisk @NFUtweets @CLAtweets @GroundwaterMike After a week of self isolation and incessant calls from T&T it might just be .... or of coarse not ....
RT @FriendsRib: @Parrog3 @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @OliverHealdUK @IvelRev @AquiferChalk What indeed. Apparently the aquifer has risen enou‚Ä¶
RT @RVFFD: Not just special circumstances missing from this dev, no onsite parking, facilities or littler bins! Big thank you to @PaulHooto‚Ä¶
@DoddyDodds @InnesThomson @EnvAgencyYNE @ERfloodrisk @NFUtweets @CLAtweets @GroundwaterMike That's just crazy talk ;-)
RT @AndrewBoothEA: I‚Äôm trialling a @KISTERS_UK HyQuest Solutions #FlyingFox coupled with a @SonTekYSI #M9 #ADCP, and getting great repeatab‚Ä¶

@Parrog3 @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @OliverHealdUK @IvelRev @AquiferChalk What indeed. Apparently the aquifer has risen enough for the pumps keeping the Shep artificially flowing at Fowlmere to be turned off earlier than usual so there is hope for some but perhaps not for the upper reaches of the Ivel Quin Rib Ash Beane & Stort until abstraction stops.

@InnesThomson @EnvAgencyYNE @ERfloodrisk @NFUtweets @CLAtweets @GroundwaterMike @GarethDLaT #EAR #ARR just think if we had an integrated water resources management strategy & regulators that understand what it means, we could benefit several times over from flood management.
RT @ever_longing: @EnvAgency As if building on floodplains was ever a great idea, @eppingforestdc said 'hold my beer' and about to do it on‚Ä¶

@NWFishEA @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews Badly wrong to be getting these issues at this time of the year, water temperature is dropping so should the algae, but it‚Äôs not, it‚Äôs getting worse day by day, the more rain we have the worse it gets.

@NWFishEA @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews It‚Äôs not been fished for 6 weeks now so no bait for 6 weeks we have had lots of rain and it‚Äôs had a good flush through and it‚Äôs still getting worse, there are storm drains running into it maybe a sewer drain is broken and seeping into the storm drain ? We just no something is

text: @burrows_andy @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews The lake immediately upstream has no issues so it‚Äôs not an inflow water problem; a localised issue through an unknown occurrence of high nutrient input. Poss‚Äô a build up of excessive baiting = poor water quality. The fish aren‚Äôt in distress. We‚Äôll investigate further if required.

Thanks @Shoothill @GaugeMap @AlanBarrierEA @EnvAgencySE - for this gauge reading @riverlevel_1947 which I use to plan kayak trips from Kew. Can you explain what caused this incredible >400m3/sec spike - which I‚Äôd want to avoid paddling with/against! Is it rainfall or tidal surge? https://t.co/kzNI2wUHJA

entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
